channel.title: [PI]Adding a slayer point system?
channel.description: Okay so I'm using Lost Legacy as my base, and slayer was already coded, with tasks and all that. It DOES NOT have a slayer points system or a slayer points shop. Could someone please link me to a tutorial, or tell me how to add a slayer points system (be rewarded for complete a task) and creating a shop for slayer points.
